**Equal Opportunity Employer**
 At Agoda, we pride ourselves on being a company represented by people of all different backgrounds and orientations. We prioritize attracting diverse talent and cultivating an inclusive environment that encourages collaboration and innovation. Employment at Agoda is based solely on a person’s merit and qualifications. We are committed to providing equal employment opportunity regardless of sex, age, race, color, national origin, religion, marital status, pregnancy, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, citizenship, veteran or military status, and other legally protected characteristics.
   

  

 We will keep your application on file so that we can consider you for future vacancies and you can always ask to have your details removed from the file. For more details please read our privacy policy .
   

  

 To all recruitment agencies: Agoda does not accept third party resumes. Please do not send resumes to our jobs alias, Agoda employees or any other organization location. Agoda is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes.

title: Sales Specialist – Sustainability
description:
Are you a dynamic, results-driven individual with a passion for sales? Are you ready to take on an exciting sales role in a rapidly growing field? At Stratsys, you will empower customers to simplify their sustainability reporting and make a real impact on their business and the environment. We are expanding our team and are now looking for several Sales Specialists to join our Product Sales Sustainability team, based in either Stockholm or Gothenburg.
   

  

 At Sratsys we offer a SaaS platform that streamlines compliance in business-critical areas such as ESG, GRC, and quality work for medium to large organizations. Our ESG tools are designed to streamline processes and empowering customers to efficiently align with directives such as CSRD/ESRS and CSDDD.
   

  

 In this role, your primary responsibility will be to engage with customers and prospects, helping them find the appropriate tools to enhance their sustainability initiatives. You will be crucial in driving sales growth by identifying new business opportunities and managing the complete sales cycle, from initial contact to deal closure. Your role will involve demonstrating how our solution can revolutionize our clients' sustainability efforts.
   

  

**WHAT'S IN IT FOR YOU?
 **💡****
* You will be a part of a high-energy and familiar culture where colleagues become friends. Take a look at our Instagram to get an insight into our culture.
* Work from a fantastic and central office in either Stockholm or Gothenburg.
* Maximum wellness allowance of SEK 5,000 and a company that encourages exercise and movement.
* We offer our employees a hybrid solution as well as flexible working hours.
* Work in a really important area with significant potential and strong market demand. The sustainability field is a growth area for us, with a well-developed pipeline and a lot of marketing support.


**About The Role  📌**
 In this position, you will be responsible for new sales of our sustainability products to mid-sized to large customers, primarily in the private sector.
   

  

**Amongst other tasks - the responsibilities include;**
* Identify, engage, and close new sales opportunities, focusing on how our SaaS solutions can transform businesses' sustainability efforts.
* Conduct market research to stay informed about industry trends and competitor activities.
* Develop and implement strategic sales plans to achieve targets and objectives.
* Proactive prospecting and outreach to build a strong sales pipeline while taking ownership of budget, pipeline, and forecasting throughout the sales process.
* Promote Stratsys vision and value proposition through customer meetings, product demos, events, and tailored initiatives.
* Engage with potential customers, build relationships, and create awareness and interest in our products through meetings and dialogue with senior decision-makers.
* Expand and maintain a strong network within the product area and Sustainability field.
* Manage agreements with new customers and offer guidance and support to customers during their purchase journey.
* Collaborate with internal teams, including marketing and product development, to deliver the best solutions to our clients.


 We thrive on creating real value for our customers by meeting them where they are. Inbound marketing, social selling, and events are vital in building lasting relationships and driving sales. We use Hubspot as our CRM system and invest heavily in digital sales and marketing events. The role offers great opportunities and freedom to build your own business!
   

  

**YOUR BACKGROUND ✔️**
* University degree in Business Administration, Sustainability Management, or similar.
* Proven track record in sales, particularly in a B2B environment and preferably from selling SaaS/Cloud-based solutions to C-levels.
* Experience managing longer deal cycles, from initial prospecting to closing the deal.
* Strong negotiation and presentation skills
* Interest in digitalization and technical systems as well as in the sustainability field, with a willingness to learn how our products can help customers in this area.
* Fluency in Swedish and English. (Norwegian is a bonus).


**It's a bonus if you have…**
* Experience in the sustainability field (CSRD, CSDDD, GHG, and ESG factors.)
* Experience leading self-driven projects or team responsibilities.
* Experience with Hubspot or similar CRM systems.
* Understanding the strategic competitive landscape of the industry by staying up to date with trends and customer needs so you can effectively position Stratsys solutions within accounts.


**About You 👀**
 You are passionate about sales, building strong pipelines, and driving new business opportunities. To thrive in this role, you will embrace an entrepreneurial spirit and a keen interest in digitalization and business management. You are familiar with delivering results against ambitious sales goals and excel in driving sales performance.
   

  

 Additionally, you value teamwork and seek to be part of a company culture where success is shared, and collaboration is key. You bring personal maturity and confidence in engaging with decision-makers alongside a proactive approach to learning and sharing knowledge with others. Your fearless, positive attitude and ability to work independently and as part of a team make you an excellent fit for our sales-driven organization.
   

  

**About Us 🚀**
 Does this look like a role for you? Do not hesitate, show your interest today since we are working ongoing with the selection of candidates.
   

  

 Is this particular role not quite right for you -  Show your interest by connecting with us. We look forward to hearing from you!
   

  

 Do you want to read more about us and your future colleagues and take part in our everyday life here at Stratsys? Go to jobs.stratsys.com or follow us on LinkedIn, Instagram and Facebook.

title: Post-Doc Opportunity at the House of Innovation, Stockholm School of Economics (SSE)
description:
The House of Innovation is looking for a dedicated scholar with a robust research background to join us for
 **two years** 
 . The ideal candidate must be comfortable working collaboratively with a dynamic team. The position will be at the heart of growing research programs on
 **sustainable business development through transformative innovation and entrepreneurship, the twin transition (green and digital) of industries, and business ethics** 
 , working primarily with Professor Mattia Bianchi. The position comes with an option to teach and strong support to publish existing research from the PhD.
   

  

 The successful candidate has built a research agenda during their PhD and is keen to develop new datasets and extend methodological and theoretical expertise. The general disciplinary background should be managerial and organization cognition, innovation, business strategy and the environment, with a strong interest in systems thinking, sensemaking and paradox theories, and the ambition to publish on the highest levels in management and organization science. The research program centers on the management of natural resources and in particular of
 **forest ecosystems** 
 . It seeks to address critical questions related to the sustainable ethos and practices of various actors in the forest industry, the role of new technologies and business models to achieve a better balance between production, social and environmental values of forests.
   

  

 A background with experience in
 **qualitative methods** 
 (case studies, interviews and observations) is essential. Sufficient knowledge of quantitative methods is also welcome. This role is ideal for candidates who are enthusiastic about contributing to our understanding of the tensions between economy and ecology, and how these challenges can be addressed through innovative cognitive frameworks, technologies, and business models. Candidates will explore the wider societal and planetary repercussions of the use of natural resources by humans.
   

  

 The postdoc position is also part of MISUM (Mistra Center for Sustainable Markets) , which is SSE’s cross-disciplinary Center of Excellence on sustainability research. The applicants must hold a PhD or equivalent and show an ability and aspiration to publish manuscripts in the top journals of our field. Priority will be given to candidates with research relevant to the topics above. Professional proficiency in English (written and spoken) is a requirement, while proficiency in Swedish (written and spoken) is an advantage. We expect the candidate to relocate to Stockholm.
   

  

**About The House Of Innovation (HOI)**
 The House is an interdisciplinary research, education, outreach, and venturing environment focused on innovation, digitalization and entrepreneurship. The foundation of any successful research environment is the quality of its research output. Where the House of Innovation distinguishes itself in this regard is in its dynamic research
   

  

 environment. Here, internationally competitive researchers are encouraged and supported to explore interdisciplinary nuances in their work and discover uncharted insights. With a strong commitment to developing talent we provide an excellent context and environment for postdoc scholars to advance their academic careers. https://www.hhs.se/en/research/research-houses/house-of-innovation/research/
   

  

**About The Stockholm School Of Economics (SSE)**
 The Stockholm School of Economics is the leading business school in the Nordics (Financial Times rankings). Enjoying a strong international reputation, the School is known for its ability to attract outstanding students and scholars from across the globe. World-class research forms the foundation of our educational offering, which includes Bachelor, Master, PhD, MBA, and executive programs. About 1800 students (excluding executive programs) are enrolled at SSE. Programs are developed in close cooperation with the business and research communities, providing graduates with a solid basis for attaining leading positions in a broad range of organizations, as well as for business venturing. The School is accredited by EQUIS, certifying that all of its principal activities maintain the highest international standards, and is the only Swedish member institution of the worldwide business school alliances CEMS and PIM, contributing to the high level of quality for which SSE is known.
   

  

 SSE is committed to a balanced gender distribution and values a variety of backgrounds and experiences among our employees. We therefore welcome all applicants regardless of their gender, ethnicity, gender identity or expression, disability, sexual orientation, age, or religion or other beliefs.
   

  

**How To Apply**
 Formal submission will be via the SSE Varbi online platform ( https://hhs.varbi.com/what:job/jobID:754681/ ). To apply, please submit the following documents:
   

  

* A cover letter articulating the candidate’s fit with the position description, including research interests and teaching experience.
* A curriculum vitae
* A separate document listing both published articles (if any) and articles submitted to journals.
* Copies of representative research.
* Names and contact information for three persons willing to provide references.


 Your application should be received by
 **October 20, 2024**
 The earliest starting date for the positions is January 2025. For further questions please contact Mattia Bianchi at: mattia.bianchi@hhs.se
   

  

 For HR-related questions: Linda Ackered linda.ackered@hhs.se

title: Master Thesis Proposal: Optical scattering measurement device
description:
**Company Description**
 AFRY is a European leader in engineering, design, and advisory services, with a global reach. We accelerate the transition towards a sustainable society. We are 19,000 devoted experts in infrastructure, industry, energy, and digitalisation, creating sustainable solutions for generations to come.
   

  

 Many of our employees have joined AFRY through their thesis work. It is a fantastic opportunity to build valuable relationships within the business and to start off your career!
   

  

 It is a win-win situation. We welcome students to learn from our experts within the area of product development to provide useful insights and knowledge from our daily work. At the same time, we nurture our connections to academia and keep up to date on the latest research.
   

  

**Job Description**
 You and your thesis work can add considerable value for us as an organization at the same time as we offer you knowledge, experience, and expertise. Of course, you will also have the opportunity of getting to know AFRY as a potential future employer! You will be assigned a supervisor who will act as an advisor while authoring your thesis.
   

  

 Within product development, especially when designing optical components, it is often important to understand the properties of a specific material. With this knowledge we will be able to design a product and understand the material's optical qualities. This provides valuable input in optical and lighting simulations where we seek a better understanding of illuminated environments. Also, it serves as the foundation for designing a product that not only meets performance requirements but also takes full advantage of the material's unique characteristics.
   

  

 During the spring of 2024 we had a group of five master thesis students developing a concept of a device measuring surface and bulk scattering properties of materials. We are now looking for a new group of students to develop this concept further. The group will be cross functional, consisting of expertise within software development, mechanical design, and optical design.
   

  

 Thesis work include:
   

  

* Project planning
* Realization of preferred design
* Testing and calibration
* Performance evaluation


**Qualifications**
 For this master thesis, we are looking for 1-2 students for each discipline mentioned above. You apply individually or together with a partner (mention in your application who you are applying together with) and will at the start of the project join forces with the other students selected by AFRY, to work together in a cross-functional team!
   

  

 You are studying your final year in one of the following or similar master programs: engineering physics with a focus on optics, data science with a focus on embedded systems, or mechanical engineering with a focus on mechanical design. As a person you are meticulous, ambitious, and curious. You are a true team player and appreciate the value added by working cooperatively together with your colleagues. You also possess good communicative skills, both oral and in writing, and can explain complex issues in a comprehensible manner.
   

  

 You reside in Sweden and are studying at a Swedish university.
   

  

 To be able to succeed with the thesis work you must have a good level of english, both oral and written
   

  

**Additional Information**
 The thesis project will be carried out at AFRY’s office in Solna and in our optics lab. The proposed thesis work period is during the spring semester of 2025, and you can apply by submitting your CV, cover letter and grades/transcripts. We will review all applications continuously.
   

  

 For questions please contact:
   

  

 Maja Lindqvist
   

  

 Recruitment partner
   

  

 maja.lindqvist@afry.com
   

  

 AFRY offers services in technology, design, digitization and consulting. We are dedicated experts in industry, energy and infrastructure, who create value for future generations. AFRY has a global reach with deep roots in the Nordics. Together, we accelerate the transition to a more sustainable society.
   

  

*At AFRY, we engineer change in everything we do. Change happens when brave ideas come together. When we collaborate, innovate technology, and embrace challenging points of view. That’s how we're making future. We are actively looking for qualified candidates to join our inclusive and diverse teams across the globe. Join us in accelerating the transition towards a sustainable future.*

title: Engineering manager till Hogia Redovisning & Revision AB
description:
*Är du redo för en ny utmaning inom programvaruutveckling? Vi söker en erfaren Engineering manager som vill underhålla våra hybridlösningar och leda skiftet till våra nya molnbaserade lösningar. Hos oss får du kombinera förmågan att säkerställa stabil drift med nyfikenhet och driv för innovation. Om du uppskattar en bred roll med strategiskt tänkande och operativt genomförande, då är Hogia Redovisning och Revision rätt plats för dig.*

 **Om rollen**  

  

I din roll kommer du att spela en central roll i att driva och förvalta våra hybrida Core produkter samt vidareutveckla våra nya molnbaserade lösningar. Du kommer att leda en grupp om 10 medarbetare bestående av utvecklare, testare och scrummaster, och du arbetar även själv operativt med utveckling. Gruppen arbetar agilt enligt SCRUM i nära samarbete med kravställare och specialister. Om du gillar att kombinera tekniskt arbete med ledarskap, kan detta vara en fantastisk möjlighet för dig.  

  

**Är du den vi söker?**  

Vi tror att du har eftergymnasial utbildning inom systemutveckling och flera års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet inom de tekniker samt ramverk som vi använder i vår utveckling. För den här rollen tror vi att det är avgörande att du har tidigare erfarenhet av att leda ett utvecklingsteam.  

  

Vi arbetar i en rad spännande tekniker och språk och söker någon med goda kunskaper inom flera av dem; C#, .Net Core, Microservices, GIT, Azure DevOps, HTML, CSS, Aurelia, React, SQL, CosmosDB, C++, MFC och XML.  

  

Vi söker en ledare som är både kommunikativ och egagerad, med förmåga att leda sitt team på ett prestigelöst sätt och själv bidra med kodning när det behövs. Du har ett genuint intresse för utveckling och ny teknik vilket innebär att du har koll på de senaste trenderna inom ditt område. Din struktur och uthållighet gör att du trivs med at driva komplexa projekt framåt. Du är en skicklig kommunikatör, både på svenska och engelsk och samarbetar smidigt med chefer kollegor och externa partners. Stor vikt kommer att läggas vid dina personliga egenskaper, då de är avgörande för att lyckas i denna roll.  

  

**Vad vi erbjuder!**


Vi bygger smarta lösningar som gör verklig skillnad för många användare, med hjälp av moderna verktyg och skarp kompetens. Vi värderar långsiktighet och hållbarhet, oavsett om det gäller våra produkter, våra lokaler eller våra medarbetare. Vi erbjuder goda utvecklingsmöjligheter och en hälsosam balans mellan arbete och fritid. Vi satsar på hälsa och erbjuder flertalet träningsaktiviteter, fina förmåner och möjlighet att jobba hemifrån ett par dagar i veckan, om du har behov av det. Hos oss får du en nyckelroll i att utforma framtidens lösningar och du kommer att arbeta i en dynamisk och innovativ miljö där din tekniska expertis och ledarskap är avgörande för vår framgång.

*Vi arbetar löpande med urval och intervjuer och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdag. Välkommen in med din ansökan!*

***Under semesterperioden 15 juli - 11 augusti kommer vi ha begränsade möjligheter att svara på dina frågor och kommer starta upp processen igen i mitten av augusti. Ha en fin sommar!***

  





**Om Hogia-gruppen**



Hogia utvecklar, säljer och supportar programvaror och IT-system för företag som effektivt vill fokusera på sina verksamheter i stället för krånglig och tidsödande administration. Vi erbjuder allt från mindre löne- och bokföringsprogram för småföretagaren till kompletta, branschspecifika IT-lösningar och -system för exempelvis kollektivtrafik, åkerier, godsterminaler, revisionsbyråer och fastighetsbolag. I Hogiagruppen finns 30 operativa bolag, som vart och ett verkar inom ett väl definierat verksamhetsområde. Vår organisationsform bygger uttalat på småskalighet och entreprenörsanda. Företagskulturen skapar engagerade medarbetare. Tillsammans ger vi våra kunder de bästa tänkbara affärslösningarna. Hogia startade sin verksamhet 1980 i Stenungsund. I dag har den familjeägda koncernen kontor i Norden och Storbritannien och 650 medarbetare. Mer information om Hogia finns på .

  




**Anställningsform** Tillsvidareanställning **Anställningens omfattning** Heltid **Tillträde** Enligt överenskommelse **Löneform** Månadslön **Sysselsättningsgrad** 100 **Ort** Stenungsund **Län** Västra Götalands län **Land** Sverige **Publicerat** 2024-09-09 **Sista ansökningsdag** 2024-10-13 **Kontakt** Lina Hedenberg, 072-4015389

title: Senior DevOps Engineer
description:
**Join our Team**
-----------------


**About this opportunity:**  

  

We are launching an exciting SaaS initiative that aims to overhaul how we deliver solutions, using As-a-Service on public Hyper Cloud Providers (HCP) as our vehicle. Our goal is twofold: To thrill our customers by delivering services they love and giving them a competitive edge, while building a “lean and mean” product development organization that will allow Ericsson to scale at profit. You will be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You will be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

If you're passionate about fostering modern product development paradigms, inspiring change, shaping innovative technology to deliver customer value, and you get a kick about building something entirely new, we want you on board!

  

This is a hybrid position based at our Ireland Athlone Office. More information about Ericsson Athlone: VIDEO: Ericsson Athlone Careers: Join us at Ericsson Ireland  

  

**Why join Solution Area Sapper:**  

  

Ericsson Cloud Software & Services (BCSS) continues to evolve cloud-native portfolio as well as explores new ways of building solutions, including enabling cloud native “as-a-Service” offerings. The newly established Sapper unit will ensure BCSS readiness for “as-a-Service” when our customers start shifting towards new network operations models that could truly maximise the opportunities and agility cloud native deployment brings. We have chosen a less traditional name for our new acceleration unit to signal that this unit will operate differently. The name Sapper originates from a soldier who performs ambitious tasks that require engineering skills, a pioneer with deep technical understanding.  

  

With us, you will have an outstanding opportunity: The chance to use your skills and creativity to push the boundaries of what is possible. To build never seen before solutions to some of the world’s toughest problems.


Within this new area, we are building a number of teams and this particular job specification is for a position as part of the Management Plane Team. In this team we will have responsibility to design and develop the Network Management of this new ‘Core Network as a Service’ offering, and by that we mean functionality such as Life cycle management, Orchestration, Configuration Management, Performance Management, among others. So we aim to design and implement a truly global SaaS management suite with a best in class User interface to manage public cloud deployed Services and infrastructure.

**Why join our team:**
----------------------



We are building a dream team, and this is what we are after…  

* Innovative atmosphere. Be part of a creative, forward-thinking team dedicated to revolutionizing the way we do software.
* Collaborative culture. Work alongside dedicated engineers who share your passion for technology and community building.
* Strong sense of purpose and high impact. Shape the future of our products and directly impact the experience of our customers and developers across our global company.
* Psychological safety. An environment where team members feel comfortable trying new things, voicing their ideas and admitting mistakes without fear of negative repercussions.
* Career growth. We invest in your development, offering opportunities to enhance your skills and advance your career.
* Endless possibilities. Your ideas and innovations won’t just be heard – they’ll be the driving force behind our success.
**What you will do:**
---------------------

* Design and develop a truly global SaaS Management Plane to manage our ‘as a service’ offerings.
* Work in an agile team using Lean, Agile and DevSecOps methodologies and tooling
* Collaborate with other development teams to ensure our Management SW applications fit and function as part of the overall solution.
* Knowledge share to onboard new team members
* Stay up-to-date with industry standard methodologies and emerging technologies

 **The skills you bring:**

* Experience in platform engineering, DevSecOps, CICD, Infrastructure-as-Code (IaC)
* Experience of Cloud Native tools and technologies: Terraform, Kubernetes, containers
* Bonus qualifications include experience with GKE, Cloud Build, Cloud Deploy, GitHub Actions
* Experienced in programming languages such as Go, Java, Javascript, Python
* Experience of designing APIs (Sync and Async) such as REST, gRPC
* Experience or knowledge of secure design and secure coding (SAST) and DAST
* Experience developing applications in a public cloud such as GCP, AWS, Azure
* Knowledge of Telecoms and in particular Network Management is an advantage
**Why join Ericsson?**


At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** [[Ireland / Sweden]] || [[Athlone / Stockholm]]
company_description: Do you want to be part of shaping the future? From making connectivity more accessible to the latest IoT solutions, you have an opportunity to be where it begins.

title: DevOps Engineer / Cloud Specialist
description:
*Vi söker nu en erfaren och driven DevOps Engineer till vårt nya team med ansvar för Länsförsäkringars gemensamma ”Cloud Data & Analytics Platform”. Teamet ansvarar och utvecklar vår Azure-baserad dataanalysplattform. Tycker du om att jobba med molnlösningar samt automatisering och vill vara med och påverka, då kan det här vara din nästa möjlighet!*  


**Om jobbet**
Som DevOps Engineer hos oss kommer du att spela en nyckelroll i att utveckla och optimera vår Azure-baserade dataanalysplattform.  

Arbetsuppgifter och ansvarsområden:
* Samarbeta med utvecklingsteam och andra intressenter för att förstå deras behov och krav, och säkerställa att plattformen uppfyller dessa.
* Designa, implementera och underhålla CI/CD-pipelines för att säkerställa smidiga och effektiva bygg-, test- och distributionsprocesser.
* Bygga Infrastruktur med hjälp av Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
* Övervaka och optimera plattformens prestanda, tillgänglighet och säkerhet.
* Konsultera och stötta olika utvecklingsteam i deras respektive molnresa.
* Delta i incidenthantering och felsökning.

  


Vårt huvudsakliga uppdrag är att tillhandahålla en robust och skalbar dataanalysplattform som möjliggör för våra användare att dra nytta av data på ett effektivt och insiktsfullt sätt. Vi är experterna som säkerställer att plattformen inte bara uppfyller dagens behov, utan också är förberedd för framtidens utmaningar och möjligheter.  

**Vem är du?**
Du har ett intresse för att utveckla dig själv och gillar att jobba i team med helhetsansvar. Du har erfarenhet av och förståelse för storskaliga molnmiljöer samt enterprise-scale och landing zones. Du har arbetat med att etablera eller utveckla molnbaserade dataplattformar.  


För att bli framgångsrik i denna roll önskar vi att du har följande:
* Erfarenhet av Azure-molninfrastruktur och lösningar.
* Förståelse för nätverk, säkerhet och databasadministration i molnmiljöer.
* Erfarenhet av att sätta upp ”self-service platforms”.
* Kunskap i scriptspråk som PowerShell och Bash.
* Relevant utbildning.


Meriterande:
* Erfarenhet inom bank eller försäkringssektorn.
* Kunskap inom SQL, C# och .NET.
* Relevanta certifieringar inom molnteknologier.
* Erfarenhet av data engineering och ETL-processer.
* Kännedom om Microsofts ramverk “Cloud Scale Analytics”.

  


**Om oss**
Välkommen till Länsförsäkringar och vårt nyetablerade Cloud Data & Analytics Platform-team!  

Vi är en grupp passionerade och kunniga individer som arbetar tillsammans för att skapa och underhålla vår nya dataanalysplattform. Vårt team består idag av en Product Owner, en Solution Architect och DevOps Engineers, alla med en gemensam vision att leverera högkvalitativa lösningar och expertis inom dataanalys.  

På Länsförsäkringar är vi mitt i en spännande resa mot molnbaserade lösningar, och dataanalys spelar en central roll i denna förflyttning. Vårt team har stora möjligheter att påverka både sina egna roller och hur vi arbetar tillsammans. Vi värdesätter innovation, samarbete och kontinuerlig förbättring, och vi strävar alltid efter att ligga i framkant av teknologiska framsteg.  

Vi är stolta över vårt arbete och de framsteg vi gör, och vi ser fram emot att fortsätta vår resa mot att bli ledande inom molnbaserad dataanalys.  


**Mer information**
*Låter det spännande?* *Då vill vi veta mer om dig! Välkommen med din ansökan redan idag. Vi arbetar löpande med denna rekrytering och kan komma att tillsätta tjänsten innan sista ansökningsdag.*  


**Sista ansökningsdag:** **2024-10-09**
  
Kort om tjänsten


**Anställningsform:** Tillsvidare
**Arbetsplats:** Stockholm
**Chef:** Ola Sundin
**Kontaktuppgifter:** Ola.Sundin@lansforsakringar.se
Vill du vara en del av lösningen, när livet förändras?


Bli en del av något större och börja jobba hos oss. En karriär hos Länsförsäkringar handlar lika mycket om att vara en hjälpande hand för våra kunder genom alla livets skeenden som att stärka lokalsamhället där du verkar.
company_description: Vill du vara en del av lösningen, när livet förändras?

title: To tekniske testere til stort agilt digitaliseringsprogram
description:
*Vil du være med til at sikre høj kvalitet i koden på et af de største og mest spændende offentlige digitaliseringsprogrammer lige nu? Har du erfaring med teknisk test og vil du arbejde agilt med Leapwork, Spock, Playwright og automatiseret test? Så er du måske vores nye kollega.*


Domstolsstyrelsen er i gang med en omfattende digital modernisering af to af domstolenes største sagsområder – straffe- og skiftesagerne. Vi bygger it-systemerne fra bunden, og brugerfokus er kernen i alt, hvad vi laver. It-systemerne vil skabe større gennemsigtighed, øge brugervenligheden og sikre hurtigere sagsbehandling for titusindvis af brugere i hele landet.


For at kunne gennemføre denne digitale udviklingsopgave har vi etableret en programorganisation under styrelsens Center for It, der er ansvarlig for at udvikle den nye løsning. Og her har vi brug for dig!


Vi søger nu to tekniske testere, som vil være med til at sikre høj kvalitet i programmets releases.


**Hos os får du:**


* rig mulighed for at arbejde med nye, moderne teknologier
* et miljø med høj faglighed, hvor du arbejder tæt sammen med dygtige specialister inden for DevOps, interaktionsdesign, it-udvikling, løsningsarkitektur, kommunikation, jura og forretningsområderne
* en transparent og tillidsfuld ledelsesstil samt et godt kollegaskab i en organisation med mange sociale aktiviteter.

**Om stillingerne**  

Som teknisk tester vil du arbejde med automatisk og manuel regressionstest af idriftsatte løsninger og nye leverancer. Du får en vigtig rolle i at sikre kodekvaliteten ved at finde fejl så tidligt som muligt og dermed reducere omkostninger og øge brugertilfredsheden ved nye releases.


Vi arbejder på seks større releases frem mod 2026, hvor det nye systemkompleks skal være færdigudviklet. Tre af de seks releases er idriftsat, og test af de kommende releases er højt prioriteret.


I samarbejde med dine kolleger bliver dine vigtigste opgaver at:


* designe, oprette og vedligeholde automatisk regressionstest
* oprette og vedligeholde testcases og testdata
* køre og udføre automatisk regressionstest og manuel test
* rapportere testresultater
* medvirke til procesforbedring på testområdet
* udføre load og performancetest samt API og integrationstest.

Vi benytter os blandt andet af følgende teknologier:


* End-to-end regressions test med Spock, Groovy, Playwright,Geb og Leapwork
* JMeter,TestRail og AzureDevOps
* Kodesproget Java (nyeste version)
* OpenAPI spec Java med Spring Boot
* Jira/Confluence.

I den ene stilling bliver du ansat i Straffe- og skifteprogrammets enhed for Product Management og Udvikling. Du vil indgå i et af enhedens fire agile udviklingsteams.


I den anden stilling bliver du ansat tidsbegrænset i et barselsvikariat i Center for It’s testmanagement team. Du vil primært løse opgaver for Straffe- og skifteprogrammet. Du vil dog ca. en dag om ugen arbejde med automatisk regressionstest i værktøjet Leapwork på andre af Domstolsstyrelsens projekter.


**Test om du er vores nye kollega**  

Stillingerne kan tilpasses dine erfaringer og kvalifikationer inden for test. Vi søger både dig, som har et par års erfaring, og dig med mange års erfaring som teknisk tester. Du kan også være en dygtig udvikler, som brænder for automatiseret test og ønsker at skifte karrierespor.


Vi lægger vægt på, at du har interesse og flair for at kvalitetssikre og levere gode løsninger til brugerne. Derudover ser vi gerne, at du har erfaring med automatiseret regressionstest og værktøjerne Spock, Playwright eller Leapwork. Det er en fordel, hvis du er ISTQB-certificeret og har erfaring med de øvrige teknologier, vi anvender.


Du har formentlig en uddannelse inden for it, fx datalogi, softwareteknologi, informationsvidenskab eller lignende. Det er dog ikke afgørende, så længe du har relevant erfaring.


Endeligt er det vigtigt at:


* du kan kommunikere klart og tydeligt på dansk om testrelaterede emner, herunder også til andre faggrupper
* du er samarbejdsorienteret og kan indgå i en konstruktiv dialog med vores udviklere, forretningsspecialister m.fl., som er dybt involveret i udviklingen
* du kan prioritere og planlægge dine opgaver og levere dem til tiden.

**Løn- og ansættelsesvilkår**  

Har du en akademisk baggrund, vil du blive ansat som fuldmægtig eller specialkonsulent i henhold til overenskomst for akademikere i staten indgået mellem Finansministeriet og en række AC-organisationer. Der vil eventuelt kunne forhandles et pensionsgivende kvalifikationstillæg afhængig af erfaring og kompetencer.


Er du ikke omfattet af AC-overenskomsten, bliver du ansat på overenskomstvilkår i henhold til organisationsaftale for kontorfunktionærer, laboranter og it-medarbejdere i staten mellem Finansministeriet og HK/Stat samt OAO-S-fællesoverenskomsten.


Det er en forudsætning for ansættelse, at du kan sikkerhedsgodkendes til ”Hemmeligt” og opretholde din sikkerhedsgodkendelse under hele din ansættelse.


Den ene stilling er et barselsvikariat af 8 til 12 måneders varighed. Den anden stilling er en fast stilling. Begge stillinger er fuldtidsstillinger.


Domstolsstyrelsen er beliggende på både Gammel Mønt i København K og Amagerfælledvej i København S. I stillingen som barselsvikar får du arbejdssted både på Gammel Mønt og Amagerfælledvej. I den anden stilling får du arbejdssted på Gammel Mønt.


Stillingerne ønskes besat snarest muligt.


**Mere om stillingen**  

Har du spørgsmål, er du velkommen til at kontakte enhedschef for Product Management & Udvikling Martin Buur på tlf. 5363 0105 eller teamleder for Testcenteret Irene Nybo på tlf. 2060 7221.

  



**Ansøgning**  

Du sender din ansøgning online via vores rekrutteringssystem. Du bliver guidet igennem processen, når du trykker på knappen ”Søg stillingen” nederst på siden.


Ud over din ansøgning bedes du vedhæfte CV, udtalelser og relevante eksamenspapirer m.v.


Vi læser ansøgninger løbende, så send din ansøgning snarest muligt **og senest den 18. oktober kl. 12.00.**


Vi opfordrer alle interesserede uanset alder, køn, race, religion eller etnisk tilhørsforhold til at søge stillingen.


  
*Danmarks Domstole er den tredje statsmagt og dermed uafhængig af politiske interesser. Vi værner om vores demokrati, retssamfund og den enkeltes retssikkerhed. Domstolene pålægger straf og afgør tvister mellem personer, virksomheder og myndigheder. Det er også domstolene, der afgør fogedsager og skiftesager samt står for tinglysning af rettigheder. Danmarks Domstole består af Højesteret, to landsretter, Sø‐og Handelsretten, Tinglysningsretten og 24 byretter. Hertil kommer retsvæsenet på Færøerne og i Grønland, Procesbevillingsnævnet, Ungdomskriminalitetsnævnet og Domstolsstyrelsen. Vi beskæftiger i alt ca. 2.400 medarbejdere. Vores værdier er ansvarlighed, respektfuld behandling, troværdighed samt åbenhed og lydhørhed.*


  
**Ansøgningsfrist**
18-10-2024  


**Tiltrædelsesdato**
Start hurtigst muligt  


**Stillingskategori**
AC-stillinger i øvrigt  


**Ansættelsessted**
Domstolsstyrelsen

title: Lead Architect
description:
**Join our innovative team and shape the future of transport and logistics!**

  

We're bringing to market a next-generation open platform designed to revolutionize the industry by addressing inefficiencies and promoting sustainable transport solutions.

  

At the heart of the Logivity lies a steadfast commitment to sustainability. Our primary goal is to transform our offerings into a net zero portfolio by 2040. To lead by example, we have also decided to focus on our supply chain and transport system by introducing innovative propulsion technology and developing capabilities that optimize the utilization of the transport system.

  

Logivity is a digital network powered by blockchain technology that ensures data integrity, secures a single source of truth, and facilitates value exchange within the system. By connecting various stakeholders in the transport industry, such as shippers, carriers, and service providers, Logivity offers a range of services while also providing the opportunity to create and offer your own services on the network. Today we are a team of 20+ people and have plans to grow within the coming years. Logivity is owned by Volvo Group.

  

You will also act as Information Security Officer for Logivity.

**What you will do**
--------------------


As the Lead Architect of Logivity, you will play an important role in contributing to our company goals by delivering a reliable and scalable platform for transport services that will help shippers and carriers go towards a net zero portfolio.

  

You will be mainly responsible for designing the architecture of our blockchain-based SaaS products, ensuring alignment with business goals and industry standards. By continuously evaluating and selecting the appropriate technology stack to optimize product performance, cyber security and development speed. Our current solution is hosted on Oracle Cloud Infrastructure, with Infrastructure as Code in Terraform, Oracle Blockchain Platform, Java microservices, and an interface with React components.

  

You will also enhance the Developer Experience by optimizing and streamlining CI/CD processes, enabling fast and secure deployments, reducing build times, and ensuring a smooth and efficient workflow for the development team.

**Who are you?**
----------------


As a person, you are an inspiration to others with a natural ability to lead through collaboration, communicate complex ideas clearly, and foster a positive, supportive work environment that motivates and inspires the whole team. You know and appreciate the start-up culture and also see the benefits of being part of the greater Volvo community. Having a background in the transport and logistics industry is a significant plus.

 **To succeed in this role, we believe that you:**

* Are a senior architect with experience in blockchain and cloud-based microservice architecture and building SaaS platforms.
* Have deep knowledge of software development processes, CI/CD pipelines, and DevOps practices.
* Drive continuous improvement by assessing and addressing technical debt, and security vulnerabilities.
* Have a security-first and privacy-by-design mindset and ensure data protection and legal compliance
* Have a structured approach and strong communication skills
**Are we a perfect match?**
---------------------------

If yes, please apply already today but no later than October 20th.

**Curious, and have questions?**
--------------------------------

Please contact: Jessica Öhrblad at jessica.ohrblad@volvo.com

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Trucks Operations** encompasses all production of the Group’s manufacturing of Volvo, Renault and Mack trucks, as well as engines and transmissions. We also orchestrate the spare parts distribution for Volvo Group’s customers globally and design, operate and optimize logistics and supply chains for all brands. We count 30,000 employees at 30 plants and 50 distribution centers across the globe. Our global footprint offers an opportunity for an international career in a state-of-the-art industrial environment, where continuous improvement is the foundation. As our planet is facing great challenges, we - one of the largest industrial organizations in the world - stand at the forefront of innovation. We are ready to rise to the challenge. Would you like to join us?
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: Testledare – Kiruna
description:
Modernera är ett modernt rekryterings- och bemanningsföretag. www.modernera.se
  
För en av våra kunders räkning söker vi nu en testledare. Vår kund är ett stabilt och tryggt konsultbolag med stark ekonomi. Företaget erbjuder intressanta uppdrag inom offentlig sektor, med fokus på samhällsnyttiga tillämpningar, och en trygg anställning med kollektivavtal. Företaget har funnits sedan 2003 och består idag av ett 100-tal medarbetare.
  
Du kommer att jobba i trevliga lokaler i centrala Kiruna. Du kommer även ha möjligheten att arbeta hemifrån.
  
  

**Dina huvudsakliga ansvarsområden kommer att vara:**  

* ledning och koordinering av testarbete
* utarbeta teststrategier och testplaner
* genomföra riskanalyser och ta fram testfall
* säkerställa att testarbetet utförs enligt definierade riktlinjer och standarder
* rapportera och följa upp testresultat
* hantera och lösa eventuella avvikelser och problem som uppstår under testprocessen
* kontinuerligt förbättra testprocessen.


**Krav:**  

* upp till 5 års erfarenhet av att leda testarbeten och testteam
* behärskar svenska språket i tal och skrift


**Meriterande:**  

* god förståelse för testmetoder och processer
* erfarenhet av agila arbetsmetoder och ramverk som ex. Continuous Delivery DevOps, Scrum eller Kanban
* erfarenhet av att arbeta i storskaliga och komplexa tekniska miljöer
* relevant akademisk utbildning inom IT
* har erfarenhet av automatiserat testarbete


**Du får:**  

* stimulerande uppdrag med samhällsnyttiga tillämpningar
* en anställning på ett företag med stabila kundrelationer och samarbeten
* balans i livet där det finns plats för både familj och fritid
* en kompetensresa som är unik för dig och din karriärresa
* en trygg anställning med kollektivavtal och bra förmåner
* en lönemodell som kombinerar anställningstrygghet med rörlig del och vinstdelning
* en platt organisation med närhet till ledning och stor delaktighet


Du kommer att bli anställd hos vår kund. Heltid. Provanställning som övergår i en tillsvidareanställning efter sex månader. Tillträde: omgående.
  
Ansök genom att skicka ditt CV och personligt brev till info@modernera.se. Skriv ”Testledare – Kiruna” i ärenderaden.

title: HR Assistent och kontorsansvarig
description:
Är du en serviceinriktad och kommunikativ person som tycker om att hjälpa andra? Är du strukturerad och lösningsorienterad? Då vill vi gärna träffa dig! Vi söker en HR Assistent som vill bli en del av vårt team i Stockholm och bidra till vårt mål att skapa den optimala arbetsplatsen för våra medarbetare.
  
  

**Vad vi erbjuder dig:**  

Vi på 0+X tror på potential och vilja framför erfarenhet. Vi söker någon med rätt inställning och en stark vilja att utmanas. Vi ser till att du får den kunskap och det stöd du behöver för att lyckas i rollen, och vårt mål är att hjälpa dig växa både personligt och professionellt.
  
  

**Om 0+X:**  

0+X (www.0x.se) är ett konsultföretag inom mjukvaruutveckling som arbetar med några av världens ledande tech företag, som FAANG-bolag, Spotify, Klarna, PayPal, Tink, Discovery, DICE, Mojang, m.fl. samt många spännande startups. Våra konsulter är seniora experter inom områden som C++, spelutveckling, frontend, backend, DevOps, Data/Cloud infrastruktur och mobilutveckling.
  
Hos oss får du chansen att jobba i ett sammansvetsat team på tio personer som tillsammans stöttar över 50 heltidsanställda konsulter i Stockholm och Malmö. Vi sitter i moderna lokaler vid Hötorget i Stockholm. Här värnar vi om en positiv arbetsmiljö och engagerar oss i team events, after works och konferenser där vi delar kunskap och bygger vår unika kultur. Vi erbjuder några av Sveriges bästa anställningsförmåner, inklusive flextid och stora möjligheter till snabb utveckling.
  
  

**Arbetsbeskrivning:**  

Vi anställer mjukvaruutvecklare från hela världen och strävar mot att direkt från start ge dem en friktionsfri relocation och onboarding i syfte att skapa den bästa möjliga upplevelsen som anställd. Detta genomsyrar alla delar i vår verksamhet och som HR Assistent hos oss kommer du att ha en central roll i att bygga ett stort mervärde för våra anställda.
  
  

**Dina huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter innebär:**  

**Kontorsansvar:** Säkerställa att kontoret fungerar optimalt genom att hantera både praktiska frågor, det sociala samspelet och arbetsmiljö, samt kontakter med leverantörer, städfirma, sköta inköp och andra liknande uppgifter.
  
**Administration:** Samordna praktiska frågor kring de anställdas boende, relocation och onboarding, samt assistera de anställda med löpande administrativa uppgifter.
  
**HR-support:** Stötta HR-relaterade uppgifter som arbetstillstånd, samt löpande support till medarbetare, HR och ledningen.
  
  

**För att lyckas i rollen behöver du:**  

Vara en noggrann, nyfiken och välorganiserad person med öga för detaljer.
  
Tycka om att möta nya människor, underhålla och bygga långsiktiga relationer.
  
Uppskatta arbete som kombinerar både stor variation och längre projekt.
  
Ha förmåga att beslutsamt och självständigt kunna driva projekt i mål.
  
Gilla att skapa och upprätthålla ordning och rutiner.
  
Handlingskraft och initiativförmåga att utmana och förbättra processer löpande.
  
Kunna tala och skriva flytande svenska och engelska.
  
  

**Meriterande:**  

Erfarenhet av att arbeta med Google Workspace (bl.a. Google Sheets och Documents).
  
Relevant utbildning inom HR, administration eller liknande områden.
  
  

**Ansökan:**  

Är du intresserad av att vara en del av vårt team? Skicka din ansökan till aleksandra@0x.se.
  
Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!

title: DevSecOps Engineer till Tyréns
description:
Nu har du möjlighet att axla en nyckelroll som DevSecOps Engineer och forma, bygga och säkra morgondagens IT-infrastruktur hos ett bolag där framtiden spelar roll.
  
Tyréns är ett av Sveriges ledande konsultföretag inom samhällsbyggnad. Med 3 000 medarbetare, inklusive tusentals specialister inom stadsutveckling, arkitektur och infrastruktur, bygger de hållbara och innovativa samhällen.Var med och rita morgondagens karta och anta tekniska utmaningar, bidra med innovation och utvecklas längsmed vägen framåt.
  
Om rollen
  
Som DevSecOps Engineer hos Tyréns får du en central roll i IT-organisationen, där du arbetar nära såväl utvecklings- som driftsteamen för att optimera och säkra Tyréns infrastruktur. Du kommer att bidra till både strategisk och operativ utveckling inom IT, där du driver automatisering, felsökning och säkerhetsintegration men också vidareutvecklar processer och rutiner.
  
  

**Huvuduppgifter arbetsuppgifter:**  

Förena utvecklings- och driftsprocesser för att skapa en smidig och effektiv miljö
  
Integrera säkerhetslösningar i samarbete med utvecklingsteamen
  
Felsöka och åtgärda säkerhetsrisker, samt proaktivt arbeta med riskhantering och incidenthantering.
  
Automatisera processer för att optimera systemutveckling och drift
  
Övervaka och analysera loggar samt systemprestanda för att säkerställa stabilitet och säkerhet.
  
Driftsätta och konfigurera hård- och mjukvara på server och klientnivå
  
  

Du blir en del ett sammansvetsat och erfaret team som jobbar med allt från avancerad nätverksinfrastruktur till support. Du kommer ha alla möjligheter att forma och påverka såväl innehåll i rollen som vidareutvecklingen av Tyréns IT-landskap, arbetssätt och processer.
  
Möjliga placeringsorter är Stockholm eller Malmö. Tyréns tillämpar en hybrid arbetsmodell där du delvis kan arbeta på distans.
  
Är det här du?
  
Vi söker dig som har en god förmåga att utmana nuläget och som är lösningsorienterad och självgående. Du tar egna initiativ för att utveckla både dig själv och organisationen. Du är duktig på att skapa samarbete med personer på olika nivåer och är hjälpsam, prestigelös och lyhörd.
  
  

**Du har:**  

Erfarenhet av scriptspråk som exempelvis Python, Powershell och/eller Bash
  
Erfarenhet av databasadministration, främst inom MS SQL
  
Goda kunskaper inom systemutvecklingsområdet
  
Erfarenhet av IT-infrastruktur i större organisationer
  
Erfarenhet av serverdrift i Linux och Windows
  
Goda kunskaper inom Microsoft Entra, Azure, MS365
  
Goda kunskaper inom IT-säkerhet
  
Erfarenhet av DevOps (metodik, verktyg, processer)
  
  

Meriterande är om du har erfarenhet av administration av databaser, systemkonfiguration och certifieringar inom IT-området. Det är även meriterande om du har erfarenhet av AWS och/eller GCP.
  
Det krävs att du har mycket goda kunskaper, skriftliga såväl som muntliga, i både svenska och engelska.
  
Intresserad av att ansöka eller få veta mer?
  
I denna rekrytering samarbetar Tyréns med IDG Recruitment. Vid intresse eller frågor kontakta Alexandra Tihinen, Rekryteringskonsult, på alexandra.tihinen@foundryco.com alternativt 070-447 92 24.
  
För att ansöka, vänligen skicka in ditt CV eller ansök med Linkedin.
  
Om Tyréns
  
Tyréns är ett av Sveriges ledande konsultföretag inom samhällsbyggnad. I samspel med kunder och partners skapar vi hållbara lösningar inom stadsutveckling och infrastruktur. Vi har 3 000 medarbetare och verksamhet i Sverige, England, Estland, Litauen, Polen och Bulgarien. Tyréns är stiftelseägt och vår ägandeform gör det möjligt för oss att satsa målmedvetet på forskning och utveckling inom samhällsbyggnadsområdet. Vi drivs av nyfikenhet och har ett nära samarbete med universitet och högskolor.

title: Operational Planner Professional (SG6) Non-Exempt (01902047)
description:
Transport is at the core of modern society. Imagine using your expertise to shape sustainable transport and infrastructure solutions for the future? If you seek to make a difference on a global scale, working with next-gen technologies and the sharpest collaborative teams, then we could be a perfect match.

**Who are we?**
---------------

Service Market Logistics (SML) is part of Group Trucks Our job is to develop, manage and optimize the Service Market supply chain for all Volvo Group brands and JV’s. We strive for an innovative and diverse workplace, living the Volvo Group values with high focus on customer success.

  

We are now looking for an **Operational Planner** in the Operational Planning/Refill team in Eskilstuna.

  

We have a collaborative environment and explorative mindset in our organization that is quite unique – and now you have the opportunity to join us!  

We are on a fantastic journey where we are exploring new technologies and solutions with the aim of developing a future competitive edge for the Volvo Group. You will play an important role in creating the supply chain of the future.

  

Are you passionate about delivering excellent customer service and driving business performance through utilizing digital technologies and insights based on data? Do you want to be part of a diverse and global team? Are you excited at the prospect of driving industry best-in-class supply network management performance? As part of our team; you can.

**Your responsibilities**
-------------------------


As an Operational Planner you are responsible for the replenishment of some of our Distribution Centers (DC) in the world. A central part of the responsibility is to understand and visualize our performance as well as take corrective actions when deviating from targets. You will be our speaking partner to colleagues in the DC and Business Area and you will take lead to proactively find solutions to existing or future challenges, in close collaboration with our colleagues.

  

Continuous Improvement is a focused area with upcoming challenges where you will play an important role. We combine knowledge in supply chain with digital skills to optimize our current supply chain and build capabilities for a better and more sustainable tomorrow. You will have opportunity to expand your knowledge and experience in both the supply chain and digitalization domain.

  

We are in the midst of a transformation journey; utilizing the possibilities of around data and advanced analytics. While this position consists to some degree of critical operational tasks, there is also great opportunity for personal growth in areas such as machine learning and microservice development in our upcoming cloud native planning solution.

  

To contribute to our team development, you need to be self-driven and take ownership and drive cross functional initiatives.


**Who are you?**
----------------


You are great at communicating and collaborating to reach the goals you set, whether it’s internally in our team or with your colleagues on the other side of the globe. You take ownership and responsibility for your work and take great pride in serving our customers.

  



In addition, you are passionate about exploring new concepts and broadening your horizon. You are not necessarily an expert in all the technical aspects of our work, but you have a strong determination and a keen mindset to learn and develop.

  

Examples of the areas where we want you to either already have some experience or have a strong interest to explore:  

  

* Python, Java and SQL programming, preferably in the cloud
* Azure, DevOps and agile working methods
* AI and/or machine learning
* Collaborating across organizational boundaries and levels to get results
  

We need you to have strong analytic skills. You like to work with large amount of data to perform in-depth analyses and have the ability to present the result of the analysis in a comprehensible manner. Experience within logistics and inventory management from studying or work is highly meriting as this is the core of our business. Required University studies within Industrial Engineering, Statistics, Computer Science, Logistics, or other relevant path.

 **For further information please contact:**  

Fredrik Tholén, Head of Operational Planning & Refill  

fredrik.tholen@volvo.com

  

Anna Bäckman, HR Business Partner  

anna.backman@consultant.volvo.com

  

Please note that we cannot receive applications via e-mail.


Last day to apply **2024-10-11**

  

We value your data privacy and therefore do not accept applications via mail.

 **Who we are and what we believe in**  

Our focus on Inclusion, Diversity, and Equity allows each of us the opportunity to bring our full authentic self to work and thrive by providing a safe and supportive environment, free of harassment and discrimination. We are committed to removing the barriers to entry, which is why we ask that even if you feel you may not meet every qualification on the job description, please apply and let us decide.

  

Applying to this job offers you the opportunity to join **Volvo Group**. Every day, across the globe, our trucks, buses, engines, construction equipment, financial services, and solutions make modern life possible. We are almost 100,000 people empowered to shape the future landscape of efficient, safe and sustainable transport solutions. Fulfilling our mission creates countless career opportunities for talents with sharp minds and passion across the group’s leading brands and entities.

 **Group Trucks Operations** encompasses all production of the Group’s manufacturing of Volvo, Renault and Mack trucks, as well as engines and transmissions. We also orchestrate the spare parts distribution for Volvo Group’s customers globally and design, operate and optimize logistics and supply chains for all brands. We count 30,000 employees at 30 plants and 50 distribution centers across the globe. Our global footprint offers an opportunity for an international career in a state-of-the-art industrial environment, where continuous improvement is the foundation. As our planet is facing great challenges, we - one of the largest industrial organizations in the world - stand at the forefront of innovation. We are ready to rise to the challenge. Would you like to join us?
company_description: Every day, we work with some of the sharpest and most creative brains in our field to leave our society in better shape for the next generation.

title: ICT Architect
description:
**Grow with us**
----------------

 **About this opportunity:**

  

Ericsson SAN Lab Operations have a strategy to transform the infrastructure service delivery in global standardized ICT environments based on software defined automated services with the aim to enable consumption of services through either a portal or application programming interface (API). This would enable further automation in the consumers’ organizations, mainly the different R&D units within Ericsson.  

The new person will be a regular team member within the SD&D unit. He/she is expected to be a senior experienced person, with at least 6 years of experience in following areas:  

* Software engineering in a context of automation of infrastructure consumption services
* Network and/or network security operations.


In addition to the above, any exposure to systems engineering in any part of the Information & Communications Technology (ICT) domain would be a very strong plus. **What you will do:**

* Active contribution in the design and development of automation of network and network security services, from pre-study to in-production in a corporate data center environment.
* Active contribution to all phases of software development, from the architecture design phase until the automated service in deployed in production.
* Active contribution to the actual software implementation phase, starting with outcome of service architecture design, software architecture design to service being release in production.
* Contribute to the evolution of the development ecosystem (development environment, development support tools…).
* Active contribution to the long-term sustainability of the automation software, end-to-end architectural software consistency and integration assignments, together with other experienced architects.
* Familiar to requirement-based approach to software and service development.
* Apply requirements engineering’s best practices during system design and aligning to Ericsson’s requirements engineering processes.

 **The skills you bring:**

* Experience in creating architectures for REST CRUD applications.
* Experience in creating large scale deployment applications.
* Very good abilities with Python programming language
* Other programming & scripting languages (ex.: Perl, Ansible, TypeScript, Jenkins, PHP, MySQL...) are plusses.
* Experience with design of CI/CD setups and related tools.
* Experience designing testing & verifications setups, as well as related tools.
* Experience with containerized service deployment.
* Experience in lean and agile ways of working and its implementation in large organizations.
* Experience with DevOps.
* Experience in network services and/or operations is a major plus.
* Excellent competence in secure architectural system and service design.
* Strong understanding of development practices (Python; REST API's and JSON; Perl; Ansible, YAML, GIT/Gerrit…).
* Understanding of Ericsson's global network infrastructure is a plus.
* Structured and see documentation as a natural way of working.
* Proven track record of achieving results in challenging environment.
* Experience interacting with stakeholders in an international environment.
* Proven track record of being a team player, interacting with strong and highly qualified colleagues.
* See the strength in diversity and gender equality.

 **Why join Ericsson?**

  

At Ericsson, you´ll have an outstanding opportunity. The chance to use your skills and imagination to push the boundaries of what´s possible. To build solutions never seen before to some of the world’s toughest problems. You´ll be challenged, but you won’t be alone. You´ll be joining a team of diverse innovators, all driven to go beyond the status quo to craft what comes next.  

  

**What happens once you apply?**


Click Here to find all you need to know about what our typical hiring process looks like.


Encouraging a diverse and inclusive organization is core to our values at Ericsson, that's why we champion it in everything we do. We truly believe that by collaborating with people with different experiences we drive innovation, which is essential for our future growth. We encourage people from all backgrounds to apply and realize their full potential as part of our Ericsson team. Ericsson is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer. learn more.

**Primary country and city:** Sweden (SE) || Stockholm

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
Greetings
 



  





**We are Hiring DevOps Cloud Engineer - Platform - Stockholm Sweden** 




  






 DevOps Cloud Engineer – Platform
 



 Stockholm Sweden
 



 Min. 6+ Years
 



 Permanent
 



 Hybrid Remote. 3 Days Work form Office, 2 Days Remote.
 



 Max. 800K SEK/Annum.
 



  





 Skillset
 



  





 Manufacturing Industry
 



 DevOps
 



 AWS, GCP or Azure is must (Any)
 



 Site Reliability Engineer
 



 Infrastructure as Code (IaC)
 



 Terraform- Coding
 



 CI/CD Pipelines/ Framework
 



 Kubernetes
 



 Programming Language (Golang or Python)
 



  





**Job Description:** 




 We know that many different names are given to this role in other companies, and that the candidate experience likely spans a variety of areas including software development, cloud and traditional infrastructure. It is likely that in the past the candidate has had titles like DevOps, infrastructure, software, cloud or site reliability -engineer/architect.
 


* Bring best practices from DevOps and site reliability engineering disciplines to industrial technology while building and improving the tooling needed to support this.
* Design, test and deploy infrastructure to operate a modern factory producing large amounts of data and connected batteries daily using infrastructure as code.
* Collaborate with software engineers to develop automation solutions for how we safely test and deploy code on anything from battery packs to cloud to factory equipment.
* Work to develop and help to document client’s processes around infrastructure and software deployment, best practices and ways of working.
* Work with the Security team to continuously test, monitor, and improve the security of our infrastructure.
* Work with our IT department to help build out the right network architecture and deployment solutions for 3rd party software we need.
* Improve and build the ML/AI Platform leveraging the data available from all our factories
* Collaborate with a cross-functional group of experts across the company to make sure we build the right things together for the right reasons and learn how electrical batteries are designed, developed, and manufactured from cradle to grave
* Keep up with the state of the art in infrastructure, “everything as a software,” virtualization, CI/CD frameworks, cross-platform software development, engineering processes, as well as develop more domain knowledge in related areas (among others, automation, battery manufacturing and connectivity)
* Help us build a great team and make client a great place to work!



  





**Skills & Requirements** 



* Deploying and managing infrastructure in the cloud (AWS, GCP or Azure) using infrastructure as code (ideally Terraform)
* Developing and managing highly automated continuous integration and deployment pipelines and helping developers increase their productivity
* Working with distributed systems, microservices, load balancing, etc.
* Working with virtualization, containerization, Kubernetes and related technologies
* Programming skills in at least one language (ideally Go or Python) and desire to learn more.
* Good communication skills, ability to Get Stuff Done, and a learning mindset
* Passion for solving problems with technology in simple yet innovative ways especially with open-source software
* Qualities that we cherish are flexibility, sense of quality, friendliness, motivation to take on new challenges, grit and a sense of humour.

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
I'm working with a well-established & successful product company in central Stockholm, who are looking for a talented DevOps engineer to join them on a permanent basis!
 



  





 Their product is a data-driven, Cloud-based platform that allows people to find, compare, and secure the best deals on their loans & interest rates, and ultimately provides technology-driven insights to help people make more informed financial decisions, and save money.
 



  





 They are partnered with over 40 of Sweden's biggest banks and insurance providers and have been consistently profitable, with over 500,000 customers using their product.
 



  





 With many new developments and plenty of scope to continually expand and enhance their product offering, they are looking to bring in a talented DevOps engineer to work alongside their lead, optimizing and managing their existing system and building as they expand!
 



  





 The team is cross functional, super collaborative and it is an environment where new ideas and input is encouraged, and everyone is evolving together!
 



  





 Role & Tech stack
 



  




* Working with IaaC, building & managing
* AWS Cloud
* Networking/DNS
* Linux
* Prometheus/Grafana
* MongoDB
* CI/CD
* Docker
* Kubernetes
* SQL
* Experience with development; NodeJS/Typescript/Javascript, or Golang would also be super beneficial!



  





 This is a permanent position, they have a super central Stockholm office, and work on a hybrid model.
 



  





 Please click 'apply', and we can have an informal discussion to discuss this position in more detail!

title: DevOps Engineer
description:
**About Froda**
 Froda was founded in 2015 with a clear vision – to revolutionize the banking experience for entrepreneurs by making it easy and affordable to invest in their ideas. Today, we are one of Sweden's fastest-growing fintech companies with large international growth plans. We are a creative tech company with the ambition to turn a historically expensive and unfair industry into something ethical and sustainable by promoting entrepreneurship.
   

  

 Our mission to revolutionize the banking experience for entrepreneurs is not only reflected in our products but also in our workplace. By fostering a culture of respect, collaboration, and continuous learning, we provide opportunities for personal growth and professional development. Join us in transforming the banking industry and be a part of our journey to empower entrepreneurs.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As we continue our growth journey and strive to elevate our tech platform, we’re looking for a skilled DevOps Engineer to join our Platform team. This team is at the heart of Froda’s technology, responsible for creating and managing the infrastructure that supports our cutting-edge fintech solutions. In this role, you will focus on automating infrastructure and cloud setups, optimizing performance, and ensuring the stability and security of our platform.
   

  

 Your role will be important for establishing and managing our CI/CD pipelines, automating routine operations, and driving efficiency in the development process. You will collaborate closely with other development teams to support broader architectural decisions and contribute to the overall strategy of our tech platform.
   

  

**Who are you?**
 We’re looking for someone who is technically skilled, proactive, and communicative. You should be a team player who enjoys taking initiative and ownership of tasks, and you should be comfortable working independently in a fast-paced environment. While we don’t require you to be a senior DevOps expert, you should have enough experience to drive initiatives independently and contribute effectively to our team.
   

  

**Key Qualifications:**
* Experience: 2-5 years in a DevOps or similar role, with hands-on experience in cloud infrastructure and automation.
* Background: Preferably from an Operations background with some development experience. Understanding the development process is important, even though your primary focus will be on operations.
* Mindset: Eager to learn, grow, and contribute to a collaborative team. Strong problem-solving skills and a “get-stuff-done” attitude are essential.


**Skills:**
* Infrastructure as Code: Proficiency in Terraform and other IaC tools.
* CI/CD Pipelines: Experience in setting up and optimizing continuous integration and deployment pipelines.
* Cloud Infrastructure: Experience with Azure or AWS.
* Containerization: Hands-on experience with Docker and Kubernetes in production environments.
* Security: Solid understanding of cloud security best practices.


**What’s in it for you?**
 At Froda, you will have the opportunity to work in a dynamic, fast-paced environment where your work truly makes a difference. We offer a collaborative atmosphere with ambitious co-workers who value work-life balance.
   

  

**What We Offer:**
* A developing & exciting work environment in a fast-growing and profitable scale-up.
* Insurance and pension plan.
* We value in-person collaboration and the dynamic energy it brings to our team, while also honoring the need for personal flexibility and work-life balance.
* A centrally located office at Slussen (Katarinahuset) with a fabulous view of Gamla stan and Skeppsholmen.
* Friendly culture that values work/life balance.
* Enjoyable team events and gatherings.


 If you’re excited about the opportunity to lead and innovate within a dynamic team, we would love to hear from you. Should you have any questions about the role or the application process, please don't hesitate to get in touch. We look forward to receiving your application and exploring the possibilities together.
